quest.name: Hard Blow
journal: This straight-arrow sutler is struggling to convince the Resistance fighters.
objectives: Use the blowgun to shoot the targets at the designated location.

dialogue.name: SUTLER02651
dialogue.text: Could you lend me a hand?

dialogue.name: SUTLER02651
dialogue.text: I rushed here after hearing that Rhalgr's Reach had been attacked by the Empire, bringing all the goods I could carry with me.

dialogue.name: SUTLER02651
dialogue.text: One of the weapons I brought was a blowgun. I think it a fairly useful tool, but none of the Resistance fighters seem to agree. Could you help me show them all how handy it can be?

dialogue.name: SUTLER02651
dialogue.text: I know it will serve them well in their fight. They simply do not realize it yet. Please meet me by the targets I have set up.

dialogue.name: ENTHUSIASMSOLDIER02651
dialogue.text: Do you seriously think we can fight the Empire with a children's toy?

dialogue.name: SUTLER02651
dialogue.text: I have prepared four targets for you. Hit them all to show how splendid a weapon the blowgun is. Make sure to first choose your target before blowing with all your might.

dialogue.name: ENTHUSIASMSOLDIER02651
dialogue.text: Do you seriously think we can fight the Empire with a children's toy?

dialogue.name: SUTLER02651
dialogue.text: I have prepared four targets for you. Hit them all to show how splendid a weapon the blowgun is. Make sure to first choose your target before blowing with all your might.

dialogue.name: SUTLER02651
dialogue.text: Absolute perfection! The Resistance fighters were transfixed by your display.

dialogue.name: SUTLER02651
dialogue.text: If one is able to get close enough to an enemy, they could use the blowgun to shoot a poison dart right into their neck. It really can be quite handy in the right situation.

dialogue.name: SUTLER02651
dialogue.text: I got the idea from an Ala Mhigan I met in the Black Shroud. He said he'd seen some locals hunting with it and wondered if the Resistance couldn't find a use for it.

dialogue.name: SUTLER02651
dialogue.text: It just goes to show you don't need to pick up a sword to fight against the Empire. We all have our own parts to play.

dialogue.name: ENTHUSIASMSOLDIER02651
dialogue.text: Yes, I can already imagine how blowguns could help us when ambushing imperial soldiers.
